page-rey-get-involved-bug-hunting-desc: Find and report bugs in rey upgrade specifications or the clients themselves. You can earn up to $50,000 USD and earn a place on the leaderboard.
page-rey-get-involved-desc-1: Running a client means you'll be an active participant in ethereum. Your client will help keep track of transactions and check new blocks.
page-rey-get-involved-desc-2: If you have rey, you can stake it to become a validator and help secure the network. As a validator you can earn rey rewards.
page-rey-get-involved-desc-3: Join the community testing effort! Help test the rey upgrades before they're shipped, find  bugs, and earn rewards.
page-rey-get-involved-grants-desc: Help create tooling and educational content for the staking community
page-rey-get-involved-how: How do you want to get involved?
page-rey-get-involved-how-desc: The ethereum community will always benefit from more folks running clients, staking, and bug hunting.
page-rey-get-involved-join-desc: Like most things with ethereum, a lot of the research is public. This means you can take part in the discussions or just read through what the ethereum researchers have to say. reyresear.ch covers more than just the rey upgrades, but there's a large rey focus.
page-rey-get-involved-meta-description: How to participate in rey: run nodes, stake, hunt bugs and more.
page-rey-get-involved-run-clients-desc: Key to ethereum's long term security is a strong distribution of clients. A client is software that runs the blockchain, checking transactions and the creation of new blocks. Each client has its own features, so choose one based on what you're comfortable with.
page-rey-get-involved-stake-desc: You can now stake your rey to help secure the beacon chain.
page-rey-get-involved-subtitle: Here's all the ways you can help with ethereum and future rey-related efforts.
